text: We receive a lot of requests to edit the blog author (and blog topic) pages - these are inherited from the blog listing template, but it would be nice for marketers to have access via the drag and drop editor --> <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-edit-Blog-Author-Page-via-Drag-and-Drop-Editor/idi-p/810360#M146961>
